com.vmware.appliance.logging

Interface Forwarding

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, ForwardingTypes, com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardingStub

    public interface Forwarding
extends com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, ForwardingTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Forwarding interface provides methods to manage forwarding of log messages to remote logging servers. This interface was added in vSphere API 6.7.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Forwarding.GetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Forwarding#get vAPI operation.
      static interface  Forwarding.SetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Forwarding#set vAPI operation.
      static interface  Forwarding.TestInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Forwarding#test vAPI operation.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.appliance.logging.ForwardingTypes

        ForwardingTypes.Config, ForwardingTypes.ConnectionStatus, ForwardingTypes.Protocol

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.appliance.logging.ForwardingTypes

        _VAPI_SERVICE_ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Forwarding.GetInvocation get()
      Returns the configuration for forwarding log messages to remote logging servers.
      Forwarding.SetInvocation set(java.util.List<ForwardingTypes.Config> cfgList)
      Sets the configuration for forwarding log messages to remote log servers.
      Forwarding.TestInvocation test()
      Validates the current log forwarding configuration by checking the liveness of the remote machine and optionally sending a test diagnostic log message from the appliance to all configured logging servers to allow manual end-to-end validation.

    • Method Detail

      • test

        Forwarding.TestInvocation test()
        Validates the current log forwarding configuration by checking the liveness of the remote machine and optionally sending a test diagnostic log message from the appliance to all configured logging servers to allow manual end-to-end validation. The message that is sent is: "This is a diagnostic log test message from vCenter Server.". This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Invocation Result:
        Information about the status of the connection to each of the remote logging servers.

        Returns:
        instance of Forwarding.TestInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described test operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • set

        Forwarding.SetInvocation set(java.util.List<ForwardingTypes.Config> cfgList)
        Sets the configuration for forwarding log messages to remote log servers. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.
        Parameters:
        cfgList - The cfgList is a list of Config structure that contains the log message forwarding rules in terms of the host, port, protocol of the log message.
        Returns:
        instance of Forwarding.SetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described set operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgument - if an invalid configuration is provided.
        UnableToAllocateResource - if the number of configurations exceeds the maximum number of supported configurations.
        Error - if there is any internal error during the execution of the operation.

      • get

        Forwarding.GetInvocation get()
        Returns the configuration for forwarding log messages to remote logging servers. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Invocation Result:
        Information about the configuration for forwarding log messages to remote logging servers.

        Returns:
        instance of Forwarding.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
